I know, any wordprocessing program is fine...but I downloaded the
trial version (45days) of a journal program here:
http://www.davidrm.com/
what makes it cool is that you can insert spreadsheets in it (helpful
for those story timelines I guess)
and it has a "notebook" feature where you can group ideas and stuff
the program is very easy to use with lots of neat features
